description:
Forced to surgically alter their bodies into girls, three yakuza brothers debut on the underground J-Pop idol scene after a year of intense training.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Washira Idol Hajimemashita. / Oyabun! Sensei? Producer!? / Amazuppai Omoide / Wakate Kureteru / Datou!! Yakuza!!
わしらアイドル始めました. / 親分! 先生? プロデューサー!? / 甘酸っぱい思い出 / わかってくれてる / 打倒!! ヤクザ!!
